casebody.data:
No. 10-6545. LaVern Berryhill, Petitioner v. Ronald A. White, Judge, United States District Court for the Eastern District of Oklahoma. 562 U.S. 1106, 131 S. Ct. 849,

178 L. Ed. 2d 554,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9631. December 13, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for reconsideration of order denying leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied.
